.github/workflows/ci.yml

Print this page 
 1 name: Build and test
 2 
 3 on: [push]
 4 
 5 jobs:
 6   build:
 7     runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
 8     strategy:
 9       matrix:
10         os: [ubuntu-latest, macOS-latest]
11 
12     steps:
13     - uses: actions/checkout@v1


14 
15     - name: Install mercurial (macOS)
16       if: contains(matrix.os, 'mac')



17       run: brew install mercurial


18 
19     - name: Build with Gradle
20       run: sh gradlew build





 1 name: Build and test
 2 
 3 on: [push]
 4 
 5 jobs:
 6   linux:
 7     runs-on: 'ubuntu-latest'




 8     steps:
 9     - uses: actions/checkout@v1
10     - name: Build and test
11       run: sh gradlew test --info --stacktrace
12 
13   mac:
14     runs-on: 'macOS-latest'
15     steps:
16     - uses: actions/checkout@v1
17     - name: Install Mercurial
18       run: brew install mercurial
19     - name: Build and test
20       run: sh gradlew test --info --stacktrace
21 
22   win:
23     runs-on: 'windows-latest'
24     steps:
25     - uses: actions/checkout@v1
26     - name: Build and test
27       run: gradlew.bat test --info --stacktrace
